name: firecrawl
title: Firecrawl
description: Scrape, search, and conduct in-depth research with Firecrawl
author: nickscamara

tools.name: deep-research
tools.title: Deep Research
tools.description: Research the web deeply for information - used for more complex search queries that require more context and deeper research.

tools.name: search-web
tools.title: Search Web
tools.description: Search the web for information - best for simple queries that require immediate results.

tools.name: scrape
tools.title: Scrape
tools.description: Get contents for a particular webpage by scraping and returning markdown.

tools.name: extract
tools.title: Extract
tools.description: Extract specific content from any set of URLs - useful for grabbing the exact data you need.

preferences.name: maxDepth
preferences.title: Max Depth - Deep Research
preferences.description: The maximum depth of the research.

preferences.name: timeLimit
preferences.title: Time Limit - Deep Research
preferences.description: The time limit of the research in seconds.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
